```diff
+ import { createRouter, createWebHistory, RouteRecordRaw } from 'vue-router';
+ 
+ const routes: RouteRecordRaw[] = [
+   {
+     path: '/login',
+     name: 'Login',
+     component: () => import('../views/login/LoginView.vue'),
+     meta: { requiresAuth: false }
+   },
+   {
+     path: '/',
+     name: 'Layout',
+     component: () => import('../components/layout/LayoutMain.vue'),
+     meta: { requiresAuth: true },
+     children: [
+       {
+         path: '',
+         name: 'Dashboard',
+         component: () => import('../views/dashboard/DashboardView.vue'),
+         meta: { title: 'ä»ªè¡¨ç›˜' }
+       },
+       {
+         path: 'projects',
+         name: 'Projects',
+         component: () => import('../views/projects/ProjectListView.vue'),
+         meta: { title: 'é¡¹ç›®ç®¡ç†' }
+       },
+       {
+         path: 'projects/create',
+         name: 'ProjectCreate',
+         component: () => import('../views/projects/ProjectEditView.vue'),
+         meta: { title: 'åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®' }
+       },
+       {
+         path: 'projects/:id/edit',
+         name: 'ProjectEdit',
+         component: () => import('../views/projects/ProjectEditView.vue'),
+         meta: { title: 'ç¼–è¾‘é¡¹ç›®' }
+       },
+       {
+         path: 'projects/:id/nodes',
+         name: 'ProjectNodes',
+         component: () => import('../views/nodes/NodeListView.vue'),
+         meta: { title: 'èŠ‚ç‚¹ç®¡ç†' }
+       }
+     ]
+   },
+   {
+     path: '/:pathMatch(.*)*',
+     name: 'NotFound',
+     component: () => import('../views/NotFound.vue')
+   }
+ ];
+ 
+ const router = createRouter({
+   history: createWebHistory(),
+   routes
+ });
+ 
+ // è·¯ç”±å®ˆå«
+ router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
+   const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
+   const requiresAuth = to.matched.some(record => record.meta.requiresAuth !== false);
+ 
+   if (requiresAuth && !token) {
+     next('/login');
+   } else {
+     next();
+   }
+ });
+ 
+ export default router; 
```

## åˆ›å»ºç”¨æˆ·çŠ¶æ€æ¨¡å—

```diff
- 
+ import { defineStore } from 'pinia';
+ import { ref } from 'vue';
+ 
+ export type UserInfo = {
+   id: number;
+   username: string;
+   role: string;
+ };
+ 
+ export const useUserStore = defineStore('user', () => {
+   const token = ref<string | null>(localStorage.getItem('token'));
+   const userInfo = ref<UserInfo | null>(null);
+   const isLoading = ref(false);
+ 
+   // è®¾ç½®token
+   function setToken(newToken: string) {
+     token.value = newToken;
+     localStorage.setItem('token', newToken);
+   }
+ 
+   // æ¸…é™¤token
+   function clearToken() {
+     token.value = null;
+     localStorage.removeItem('token');
+   }
+ 
+   // è®¾ç½®ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
+   function setUserInfo(info: UserInfo) {
+     userInfo.value = info;
+   }
+ 
+   // ç™»å½•
+   async function login(username: string, password: string) {
+     // å®é™…é¡¹ç›®ä¸­è¿™é‡Œä¼šè°ƒç”¨API
+     isLoading.value = true;
+     try {
+       // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç™»å½•è¯·æ±‚
+       await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000));
+       setToken('mock_token');
+       setUserInfo({
+         id: 1,
+         username,
+         role: 'admin'
+       });
+       return true;
+     } catch (error) {
+       return false;
+     } finally {
+       isLoading.value = false;
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // ç™»å‡º
+   function logout() {
+     clearToken();
+     userInfo.value = null;
+   }
+ 
+   return {
+     token,
+     userInfo,
+     isLoading,
+     login,
+     logout,
+     setUserInfo
+   };
+ }); 
```

## åˆ›å»ºAPIè¯·æ±‚å·¥å…·

---

```diff
- 
+ import axios, { AxiosRequestConfig, AxiosResponse } from 'axios';
+ import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus';
+ 
+ // åˆ›å»ºaxioså®ä¾‹
+ const service = axios.create({
+   baseURL: import.meta.env.VITE_API_URL || 'http://localhost:3000/api',
+   timeout: 10000,
+   headers: {
+     'Content-Type': 'application/json'
+   }
+ });
+ 
+ // è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
+ service.interceptors.request.use(
+   (config) => {
+     // ä»localStorageè·å–token
+     const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
+     if (token) {
+       config.headers['Authorization'] = `Bearer ${token}`;
+     }
+     return config;
+   },
+   (error) => {
+     return Promise.reject(error);
+   }
+ );
+ 
+ // å“åº”æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
+ service.interceptors.response.use(
+   (response: AxiosResponse) => {
+     const res = response.data;
+     
+     // å¦‚æœè¿”å›çš„çŠ¶æ€ç ä¸æ˜¯200ï¼Œè¯´æ˜æ¥å£è¯·æ±‚æœ‰è¯¯
+     if (response.status !== 200) {
+       ElMessage({
+         message: res.message || 'è¯·æ±‚é”™è¯¯',
+         type: 'error',
+         duration: 5 * 1000
+       });
+       
+       // 401: æœªç™»å½•æˆ–tokenè¿‡æœŸ
+       if (response.status === 401) {
+         // å¯ä»¥åœ¨è¿™é‡Œå¤„ç†ç™»å‡ºé€»è¾‘
+         localStorage.removeItem('token');
+         window.location.href = '/login';
+       }
+       
+       return Promise.reject(new Error(res.message || 'è¯·æ±‚é”™è¯¯'));
+     } else {
+       return res;
+     }
+   },
+   (error) => {
+     ElMessage({
+       message: error.message || 'è¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥',
+       type: 'error',
+       duration: 5 * 1000
+     });
+     return Promise.reject(error);
+   }
+ );
+ 
+ // å°è£…GETè¯·æ±‚
+ export function get<T>(url: string, params?: any, config?: AxiosRequestConfig): Promise<T> {
+   return service.get(url, { params, ...config });
+ }
+ 
+ // å°è£…POSTè¯·æ±‚
+ export function post<T>(url: string, data?: any, config?: AxiosRequestConfig): Promise<T> {
+   return service.post(url, data, config);
+ }
+ 
+ // å°è£…PUTè¯·æ±‚
+ export function put<T>(url: string, data?: any, config?: AxiosRequestConfig): Promise<T> {
+   return service.put(url, data, config);
+ }
+ 
+ // å°è£…DELETEè¯·æ±‚
+ export function del<T>(url: string, config?: AxiosRequestConfig): Promise<T> {
+   return service.delete(url, config);
+ }
+ 
+ export default service; 
```

## åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®APIæœåŠ¡

---

```diff
- 
+ import { get, post, put, del } from './request';
+ 
+ export type ProjectStatus = 'not_started' | 'in_progress' | 'completed' | 'delayed';
+ 
+ export type Project = {
+   id: number;
+   name: string;
+   deliverables: string;
+   startDate: string;
+   daysToComplete: number;
+   expectedEndDate: string;
+   status: ProjectStatus;
+   password: string;
+ };
+ 
+ export type CreateProjectDto = Omit<Project, 'id'>;
+ export type UpdateProjectDto = Partial<CreateProjectDto>;
+ 
+ // è·å–é¡¹ç›®åˆ—è¡¨
+ export function getProjects() {
+   return get<{ data: Project[] }>('/projects');
+ }
+ 
+ // è·å–é¡¹ç›®è¯¦æƒ…
+ export function getProject(id: number) {
+   return get<{ data: Project }>(`/projects/${id}`);
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®
+ export function createProject(project: CreateProjectDto) {
+   return post<{ data: Project }>('/projects', project);
+ }
+ 
+ // æ›´æ–°é¡¹ç›®
+ export function updateProject(id: number, project: UpdateProjectDto) {
+   return put<{ data: Project }>(`/projects/${id}`, project);
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ é™¤é¡¹ç›®
+ export function deleteProject(id: number) {
+   return del<{ success: boolean }>(`/projects/${id}`);
+ }
+ 
+ // éªŒè¯é¡¹ç›®å¯†ç 
+ export function verifyProjectPassword(id: number, password: string) {
+   return post<{ valid: boolean }>('/projects/verify-password', { id, password });
+ } 
```

```diff
+ <template>

+           <div class="header-right">
+             <el-dropdown>
+               <span class="el-dropdown-link">
+                 {{ userInfo?.username || 'ç®¡ç†å‘˜' }}
+                 <el-icon class="el-icon--right"><el-icon-arrow-down /></el-icon>
+               </span>
+               <template #dropdown>
+                 <el-dropdown-menu>
+                   <el-dropdown-item @click="handleLogout">é€€å‡ºç™»å½•</el-dropdown-item>
+                 </el-dropdown-menu>
+               </template>
+             </el-dropdown>
+           </div>
+         </el-header>

+           <router-view />
+         </el-main>
+       </el-container>
+     </el-container>
+   </div>

+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { computed } from 'vue';
+ import { useRoute, useRouter } from 'vue-router';
+ import { useUserStore } from '../../store/modules/user';
+ 
+ const route = useRoute();
+ const router = useRouter();
+ const userStore = useUserStore();
+ 
+ const userInfo = computed(() => userStore.userInfo);
+ 
+ // å½“å‰æ¿€æ´»çš„èœå•
+ const activeMenu = computed(() => {
+   return route.path;
+ });
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†ç™»å‡º
+ const handleLogout = () => {
+   userStore.logout();
+   router.push('/login');
+ };
+ </script>

+   height: 100vh;
```

```diff
- 
+ <template>
+   <div class="login-container">
+     <div class="login-box">
+       <div class="login-title">
+         <h2>æµç¨‹ç‹ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿ</h2>
+       </div>
+       <el-form
+         ref="loginFormRef"
+         :model="loginForm"
+         :rules="loginRules"
+         label-width="0"
+         class="login-form"
+       >
+         <el-form-item prop="username">
+           <el-input
+             v-model="loginForm.username"
+             placeholder="ç”¨æˆ·å"
+             prefix-icon="el-icon-user"
+           />
+         </el-form-item>
+         <el-form-item prop="password">
+           <el-input
+             v-model="loginForm.password"
+             type="password"
+             placeholder="å¯†ç "
+             prefix-icon="el-icon-lock"
+             @keyup.enter="handleLogin"
+           />
+         </el-form-item>
+         <el-form-item>
+           <el-button
+             :loading="isLoading"
+             type="primary"
+             class="login-button"
+             @click="handleLogin"
+           >
+             ç™»å½•
+           </el-button>
+         </el-form-item>
+       </el-form>
+     </div>
+   </div>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { reactive, ref, computed } from 'vue';
+ import { useRouter } from 'vue-router';
+ import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus';
+ import type { FormInstance, FormRules } from 'element-plus';
+ import { useUserStore } from '../../store/modules/user';
+ 
+ const router = useRouter();
+ const userStore = useUserStore();
+ const loginFormRef = ref<FormInstance>();
+ 
+ const isLoading = computed(() => userStore.isLoading);
+ 
+ // ç™»å½•è¡¨å•
+ const loginForm = reactive({
+   username: '',
+   password: ''
+ });
+ 
+ // è¡¨å•éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™
+ const loginRules = reactive<FormRules>({
+   username: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·å', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 3, max: 20, message: 'é•¿åº¦åœ¨ 3 åˆ° 20 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   password: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 6, max: 20, message: 'é•¿åº¦åœ¨ 6 åˆ° 20 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ]
+ });
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†ç™»å½•
+ const handleLogin = async () => {
+   if (!loginFormRef.value) return;
+   
+   await loginFormRef.value.validate(async (valid) => {
+     if (valid) {
+       try {
+         const result = await userStore.login(loginForm.username, loginForm.password);
+         if (result) {
+           ElMessage.success('ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸ');
+           router.push('/');
+         } else {
+           ElMessage.error('ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç ');
+         }
+       } catch (error) {
+         ElMessage.error('ç™»å½•è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯');
+         console.error(error);
+       }
+     } else {
+       return false;
+     }
+   });
+ };
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .login-container {
+   display: flex;
+   justify-content: center;
+   align-items: center;
+   height: 100vh;
+   background-color: #f0f2f5;
+ }
+ 
+ .login-box {
+   width: 350px;
+   padding: 30px;
+   background: #fff;
+   border-radius: 4px;
+   box-shadow: 0 2px 12px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
+ }
+ 
+ .login-title {
+   text-align: center;
+   margin-bottom: 30px;
+ }
+ 
+ .login-form {
+   margin-top: 20px;
+ }
+ 
+ .login-button {
+   width: 100%;
+ }
+ </style>
```

```diff
+ import type { Project, ProjectStatus } from '../../api/projectService';
+ 
+ const router = useRouter();
+ 
+ // ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®
+ const projectCount = ref(0);
+ const inProgressCount = ref(0);
+ const completedCount = ref(0);
+ 
+ // æœ€è¿‘é¡¹ç›®

+ 
+ // è·å–çŠ¶æ€ç±»å‹

+     not_started: 'info',
+     in_progress: 'primary',
+     completed: 'success',
+     delayed: 'danger'
+   };
+   return statusMap[status];
+ };

+     completed: 'å·²å®Œæˆ',
+     delayed: 'å·²å»¶æœŸ'
```

```diff
- 
+ Page({
+   data: {
+     searchValue: '',
+     recentProjects: [],
+     projects: []
+   },
+ 
+   onLoad() {
+     // è·å–æœ€è¿‘è®¿é—®çš„é¡¹ç›®
+     const recentProjects = wx.getStorageSync('recentProjects') || [];
+     this.setData({
+       recentProjects
+     });
+   },
+ 
+   // æœç´¢è¾“å…¥
+   onSearchInput(e) {
+     this.setData({
+       searchValue: e.detail
+     });
+   },
+ 
+   // æœç´¢é¡¹ç›®
+   onSearch() {
+     const { searchValue } = this.data;
+     if (!searchValue.trim()) {
+       wx.showToast({
+         title: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æœç´¢å†…å®¹',
+         icon: 'none'
+       });
+       return;
+     }
+ 
+     // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæœç´¢ç»“æœï¼Œå®é™…é¡¹ç›®ä¸­åº”è¯¥è°ƒç”¨API
+     const mockProjects = [
+       {
+         id: 1,
+         name: 'æµç¨‹ç‹é¡¹ç›®',
+         status: 'in_progress',
+         expectedEndDate: '2023-03-31'
+       },
+       {
+         id: 2,
+         name: 'ä¼ä¸šå®˜ç½‘æ”¹ç‰ˆ',
+         status: 'completed',
+         expectedEndDate: '2023-03-07'
+       },
+       {
+         id: 3,
+         name: 'ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯APPå¼€å‘',
+         status: 'not_started',
+         expectedEndDate: '2023-04-24'
+       }
+     ];
+ 
+     // è¿‡æ»¤æœç´¢ç»“æœ
+     const filteredProjects = mockProjects.filter(project => 
+       project.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase())
+     );
+ 
+     this.setData({
+       projects: filteredProjects
+     });
+   },
+ 
+   // æŸ¥çœ‹é¡¹ç›®è¯¦æƒ…
+   viewProject(e) {
+     const { id } = e.currentTarget.dataset;
+     
+     // è·³è½¬åˆ°å¯†ç éªŒè¯é¡µé¢
+     wx.navigateTo({
+       url: `/pages/login/login?projectId=${id}`
+     });
+   },
+ 
+   // æ¸…ç©ºæœç´¢
+   clearSearch() {
+     this.setData({
+       searchValue: '',
+       projects: []
+     });
+   }
+ }) 
```

```diff

+ <!--pages/index/index.wxml-->
+ <view class="container">
+   <!-- æœç´¢æ¡† -->
+   <view class="search-container">
+     <view class="search-box">
+       <input 
+         class="search-input" 
+         placeholder="æœç´¢é¡¹ç›®åç§°" 
+         value="{{searchValue}}"
+         bindinput="onSearchInput"
+         confirm-type="search"
+         bindconfirm="onSearch"
+       />
+       <view class="search-btn" bindtap="onSearch">æœç´¢</view>
+     </view>
+   </view>
+ 
+   <!-- æœ€è¿‘è®¿é—®é¡¹ç›® -->
+   <view class="recent-projects" wx:if="{{recentProjects.length > 0 && !projects.length}}">
+     <view class="section-title">æœ€è¿‘è®¿é—®</view>
+     <view class="project-list">
+       <view 
+         class="project-item" 
+         wx:for="{{recentProjects}}" 
+         wx:key="id"
+         data-id="{{item.id}}"
+         bindtap="viewProject"
+       >
+         <view class="project-name">{{item.name}}</view>
+         <view class="project-status">
+           <text class="status-tag {{item.status === 'completed' ? 'status-completed' : item.status === 'in_progress' ? 'status-progress' : 'status-pending'}}">
+             {{item.status === 'completed' ? 'å·²å®Œæˆ' : item.status === 'in_progress' ? 'è¿›è¡Œä¸­' : 'æœªå¼€å§‹'}}
+           </text>
+         </view>
+         <view class="project-date">é¢„è®¡å®Œæˆ: {{item.expectedEndDate}}</view>
+       </view>
+     </view>
+   </view>
+ 
+   <!-- æœç´¢ç»“æœ -->
+   <view class="search-results" wx:if="{{projects.length > 0}}">
+     <view class="section-title">
+       æœç´¢ç»“æœ
+       <text class="clear-search" bindtap="clearSearch">æ¸…ç©º</text>
+     </view>

+       </view>
+     </view>
+   </view>
```

```diff
- 
+ // pages/login/login.js
+ Page({
+   data: {
+     projectId: null,
+     password: '',
+     projectInfo: null,
+     isLoading: false
+   },
+ 
+   onLoad(options) {
+     if (options.projectId) {
+       this.setData({
+         projectId: parseInt(options.projectId)
+       });
+       this.getProjectInfo(options.projectId);
+     }
+   },
+ 
+   // è·å–é¡¹ç›®åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
+   getProjectInfo(projectId) {
+     // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿè·å–é¡¹ç›®ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå®é™…é¡¹ç›®ä¸­åº”è¯¥è°ƒç”¨API
+     const mockProjects = [
+       {
+         id: 1,
+         name: 'æµç¨‹ç‹é¡¹ç›®',
+         status: 'in_progress'
+       },
+       {
+         id: 2,
+         name: 'ä¼ä¸šå®˜ç½‘æ”¹ç‰ˆ',
+         status: 'completed'
+       },
+       {
+         id: 3,
+         name: 'ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯APPå¼€å‘',
+         status: 'not_started'
+       }
+     ];
+ 
+     const project = mockProjects.find(p => p.id === parseInt(projectId));
+     
+     if (project) {
+       this.setData({
+         projectInfo: project
+       });
+     } else {
+       wx.showToast({
+         title: 'é¡¹ç›®ä¸å­˜åœ¨',
+         icon: 'none'
+       });
+       setTimeout(() => {
+         wx.navigateBack();
+       }, 1500);
+     }
+   },
+ 
+   // å¯†ç è¾“å…¥
+   onPasswordInput(e) {
+     this.setData({
+       password: e.detail.value
+     });
+   },
+ 
+   // éªŒè¯å¯†ç 
+   verifyPassword() {
+     const { projectId, password } = this.data;
+     
+     if (!password.trim()) {
+       wx.showToast({
+         title: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ',
+         icon: 'none'
+       });
+       return;
+     }
+ 
+     this.setData({
+       isLoading: true
+     });
+ 
+     // æ¨¡æ‹ŸéªŒè¯å¯†ç ï¼Œå®é™…é¡¹ç›®ä¸­åº”è¯¥è°ƒç”¨API
+     setTimeout(() => {
+       // å‡è®¾å¯†ç æ˜¯123456
+       if (password === '123456') {
+         // ä¿å­˜åˆ°æœ€è¿‘è®¿é—®é¡¹ç›®
+         this.saveToRecentProjects();
+         
+         // è·³è½¬åˆ°é¡¹ç›®æµç¨‹é¡µ
+         wx.navigateTo({
+           url: `/pages/project-flow/project-flow?projectId=${projectId}`
+         });
+       } else {
+         wx.showToast({
+           title: 'å¯†ç é”™è¯¯',
+           icon: 'none'
+         });
+       }
+       
+       this.setData({
+         isLoading: false
+       });
+     }, 1000);
+   },
+ 
+   // ä¿å­˜åˆ°æœ€è¿‘è®¿é—®é¡¹ç›®
+   saveToRecentProjects() {
+     const { projectInfo } = this.data;
+     if (!projectInfo) return;
+ 
+     let recentProjects = wx.getStorageSync('recentProjects') || [];
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²å­˜åœ¨
+     const index = recentProjects.findIndex(p => p.id === projectInfo.id);
+     if (index > -1) {
+       // å·²å­˜åœ¨åˆ™åˆ é™¤æ—§è®°å½•
+       recentProjects.splice(index, 1);
+     }
+     
+     // æ·»åŠ åˆ°æœ€å‰é¢
+     recentProjects.unshift(projectInfo);
+     
+     // åªä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘5ä¸ª
+     if (recentProjects.length > 5) {
+       recentProjects = recentProjects.slice(0, 5);
+     }
+     
+     wx.setStorageSync('recentProjects', recentProjects);
+   }
+ }) 
```

```diff

+ Page({
+   data: {
+     projectId: null,
+     project: null,
+     nodes: [],
+     activeNodeId: null,
+     progress: 0,
+     isLoading: true
+   },

+       this.setData({
+         projectId: parseInt(options.projectId)

+         title: 'é¡¹ç›®IDä¸å­˜åœ¨',

+           expectedEndDate: '2023-03-20',

+             { id: 4, content: 'UIè®¾è®¡æœªå®Œæˆ' },
+             { id: 5, content: 'æ•°æ®åº“è®¾è®¡å¾…ä¼˜åŒ–' }

+           materials: [

+           ]

+         isLoading: false
+       });
+     }, 1000);
+   },
+

+   toggleNode(e) {
+     const nodeId = e.currentTarget.dataset.id;
+     this.setData({
+       activeNodeId: this.data.activeNodeId === nodeId ? null : nodeId
+     });
+   },
+ 
+   // æŸ¥çœ‹å‰ç½®æ¡ä»¶

+     const nodeId = e.currentTarget.dataset.nodeid;

+     });
+   },

+   // æŸ¥çœ‹æˆæœ
+   viewResult() {
+     const { projectId } = this.data;
+     wx.navigateTo({
+       url: `/pages/result/result?projectId=${projectId}`
+     });
+   }
+ })
```

```sql
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `username` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ç”¨æˆ·å',
  `password` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT 'å¯†ç ',
  `role` enum('admin', 'employee') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'employee' COMMENT 'è§’è‰²ï¼šadmin-ç®¡ç†å‘˜ï¼Œemployee-å‘˜å·¥',

  `email` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'é‚®ç®±',
  `phone` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'æ‰‹æœºå·',
  `avatar` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'å¤´åƒURL',
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´',
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´',
```

### 2. é¡¹ç›®è¡¨(projects)

```sql
  `expected_end_date` date NOT NULL COMMENT 'é¢„è®¡å®Œæˆæ—¥æœŸ',

  `password` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT 'é¡¹ç›®æŸ¥è¯¢å¯†ç ',
  `created_by` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'åˆ›å»ºäººID',
```

### 3. èŠ‚ç‚¹è¡¨(nodes)

## å®ç°NestJSå®ä½“ç±»

ç°åœ¨ï¼Œè®©æˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨åç«¯é¡¹ç›®ä¸­åˆ›å»ºå¯¹åº”çš„å®ä½“ç±»ï¼š

### 1. ç”¨æˆ·å®ä½“ç±»

---

```diff
- 
+ import { Entity, Column, PrimaryGeneratedColumn, CreateDateColumn, UpdateDateColumn, OneToMany } from 'typeorm';
+ import { Project } from './project.entity';
+ 
+ export enum UserRole {
+   ADMIN = 'admin',
+   EMPLOYEE = 'employee'
+ }
+ 
+ @Entity('users')
+ export class User {
+   @PrimaryGeneratedColumn()
+   id: number;
+ 
+   @Column({ length: 50, unique: true })
+   username: string;
+ 
+   @Column({ length: 100 })
+   password: string;
+ 
+   @Column({
+     type: 'enum',
+     enum: UserRole,
+     default: UserRole.EMPLOYEE
+   })
+   role: UserRole;
+ 
+   @Column({ length: 50, nullable: true, name: 'real_name' })
+   realName: string;
+ 
+   @Column({ length: 100, nullable: true })
+   email: string;
+ 
+   @Column({ length: 20, nullable: true })
+   phone: string;
+ 
+   @Column({ length: 255, nullable: true })
+   avatar: string;
+ 
+   @CreateDateColumn({ name: 'created_at' })
+   createdAt: Date;
+ 
+   @UpdateDateColumn({ name: 'updated_at' })
+   updatedAt: Date;
+ 
+   @OneToMany(() => Project, project => project.createdBy)
+   projects: Project[];
+ } 
```

---

### 2. é¡¹ç›®å®ä½“ç±»

---

```diff
- 
+ import { Entity, Column, PrimaryGeneratedColumn, CreateDateColumn, UpdateDateColumn, ManyToOne, OneToMany, JoinColumn } from 'typeorm';
+ import { User } from './user.entity';
+ import { Node } from './node.entity';
+ 
+ export enum ProjectStatus {
+   NOT_STARTED = 'not_started',
+   IN_PROGRESS = 'in_progress',
+   COMPLETED = 'completed',
+   DELAYED = 'delayed'
+ }
+ 
+ @Entity('projects')
+ export class Project {
+   @PrimaryGeneratedColumn()
+   id: number;
+ 
+   @Column({ length: 100 })
+   name: string;
+ 
+   @Column({ type: 'text' })
+   deliverables: string;
+ 
+   @Column({ name: 'start_date' })
+   startDate: Date;
+ 
+   @Column({ name: 'days_to_complete' })
+   daysToComplete: number;
+ 
+   @Column({ name: 'expected_end_date' })
+   expectedEndDate: Date;
+ 
+   @Column({
+     type: 'enum',
+     enum: ProjectStatus,
+     default: ProjectStatus.NOT_STARTED
+   })
+   status: ProjectStatus;
+ 
+   @Column({ length: 50 })
+   password: string;
+ 
+   @Column({ name: 'created_by' })
+   createdById: number;
+ 
+   @ManyToOne(() => User, user => user.projects)
+   @JoinColumn({ name: 'created_by' })
+   createdBy: User;
+ 
+   @OneToMany(() => Node, node => node.project)
+   nodes: Node[];
+ 
+   @CreateDateColumn({ name: 'created_at' })
+   createdAt: Date;
+ 
+   @UpdateDateColumn({ name: 'updated_at' })
+   updatedAt: Date;
+ } 
```

---

### 3. èŠ‚ç‚¹å®ä½“ç±»

---

```diff
- 
+ import { Entity, Column, PrimaryGeneratedColumn, CreateDateColumn, UpdateDateColumn, ManyToOne, OneToMany, JoinColumn } from 'typeorm';
+ import { Project } from './project.entity';
+ import { Issue } from './issue.entity';
+ import { Material } from './material.entity';
+ 
+ export enum NodeStatus {
+   NOT_STARTED = 'not_started',
+   IN_PROGRESS = 'in_progress',
+   COMPLETED = 'completed',
+   DELAYED = 'delayed'
+ }
+ 
+ @Entity('nodes')
+ export class Node {
+   @PrimaryGeneratedColumn()
+   id: number;
+ 
+   @Column({ name: 'project_id' })
+   projectId: number;
+ 
+   @ManyToOne(() => Project, project => project.nodes)
+   @JoinColumn({ name: 'project_id' })
+   project: Project;
+ 
+   @Column({ length: 100 })
+   name: string;
+ 
+   @Column()
+   order: number;
+ 
+   @Column({
+     type: 'enum',
+     enum: NodeStatus,
+     default: NodeStatus.NOT_STARTED
+   })
+   status: NodeStatus;
+ 
+   @Column({ name: 'expected_end_date', nullable: true })
+   expectedEndDate: Date;
+ 
+   @Column({ name: 'actual_end_date', nullable: true })
+   actualEndDate: Date;
+ 
+   @Column({ name: 'is_prerequisite', default: false })
+   isPrerequisite: boolean;
+ 
+   @Column({ name: 'is_result', default: false })
+   isResult: boolean;
+ 
+   @OneToMany(() => Issue, issue => issue.node)
+   issues: Issue[];
+ 
+   @OneToMany(() => Material, material => material.node)
+   materials: Material[];
+ 
+   @CreateDateColumn({ name: 'created_at' })
+   createdAt: Date;
+ 
+   @UpdateDateColumn({ name: 'updated_at' })
+   updatedAt: Date;
+ } 
```

---

### 4. é—®é¢˜å®ä½“ç±»

---

```diff
- 
+ import { Entity, Column, PrimaryGeneratedColumn, CreateDateColumn, UpdateDateColumn, ManyToOne, JoinColumn } from 'typeorm';
+ import { Node } from './node.entity';
+ 
+ export enum IssueStatus {
+   PENDING = 'pending',
+   RESOLVED = 'resolved'
+ }
+ 
+ @Entity('issues')
+ export class Issue {
+   @PrimaryGeneratedColumn()
+   id: number;
+ 
+   @Column({ name: 'node_id' })
+   nodeId: number;
+ 
+   @ManyToOne(() => Node, node => node.issues)
+   @JoinColumn({ name: 'node_id' })
+   node: Node;
+ 
+   @Column({ type: 'text' })
+   content: string;
+ 
+   @Column({
+     type: 'enum',
+     enum: IssueStatus,
+     default: IssueStatus.PENDING
+   })
+   status: IssueStatus;
+ 
+   @CreateDateColumn({ name: 'created_at' })
+   createdAt: Date;
+ 
+   @UpdateDateColumn({ name: 'updated_at' })
+   updatedAt: Date;
+ } 
```

---

### 5. ææ–™å®ä½“ç±»

---

```diff
- 
+ import { Entity, Column, PrimaryGeneratedColumn, CreateDateColumn, UpdateDateColumn, ManyToOne, JoinColumn } from 'typeorm';
+ import { Node } from './node.entity';
+ 
+ @Entity('materials')
+ export class Material {
+   @PrimaryGeneratedColumn()
+   id: number;
+ 
+   @Column({ name: 'node_id' })
+   nodeId: number;
+ 
+   @ManyToOne(() => Node, node => node.materials)
+   @JoinColumn({ name: 'node_id' })
+   node: Node;
+ 
+   @Column({ length: 100 })
+   name: string;
+ 
+   @Column({ type: 'text' })
+   content: string;
+ 
+   @Column({ name: 'file_url', nullable: true, length: 255 })
+   fileUrl: string;
+ 
+   @CreateDateColumn({ name: 'created_at' })
+   createdAt: Date;
+ 
+   @UpdateDateColumn({ name: 'updated_at' })
+   updatedAt: Date;
+ } 
```

---

### 6. åˆ›å»ºå®ä½“ç´¢å¼•æ–‡ä»¶

---

```diff
- 
+ export * from './user.entity';
+ export * from './project.entity';
+ export * from './node.entity';
+ export * from './issue.entity';
+ export * from './material.entity'; 
```

## æ›´æ–°æ•°æ®åº“é…ç½®

ç°åœ¨ï¼Œè®©æˆ‘ä»¬æ›´æ–°NestJSçš„æ•°æ®åº“é…ç½®ï¼Œä½¿å…¶èƒ½å¤Ÿè¿æ¥åˆ°æˆ‘ä»¬çš„æ•°æ®åº“å¹¶ä½¿ç”¨æˆ‘ä»¬åˆ›å»ºçš„å®ä½“ç±»ï¼š

---

```diff
- 
+ import { Module } from '@nestjs/common';
+ import { ConfigModule, ConfigService } from '@nestjs/config';
+ import { TypeOrmModule } from '@nestjs/typeorm';
+ import { User, Project, Node, Issue, Material } from './database/entities';
+ 
+ @Module({
+   imports: [
+     // é…ç½®æ¨¡å—
+     ConfigModule.forRoot({
+       isGlobal: true,
+     }),
+     
+     // æ•°æ®åº“æ¨¡å—
+     TypeOrmModule.forRootAsync({
+       imports: [ConfigModule],
+       inject: [ConfigService],
+       useFactory: (configService: ConfigService) => ({
+         type: 'mysql',
+         host: configService.get('DB_HOST', 'localhost'),
+         port: configService.get<number>('DB_PORT', 3306),
+         username: configService.get('DB_USERNAME', 'root'),
+         password: configService.get('DB_PASSWORD', 'root'),
+         database: configService.get('DB_DATABASE', 'liuchengwang'),
+         entities: [User, Project, Node, Issue, Material],
+         synchronize: configService.get('NODE_ENV') !== 'production',
+         logging: configService.get('NODE_ENV') !== 'production',
+       }),
+     }),
+     
+     // ä¸šåŠ¡æ¨¡å—å°†åœ¨åç»­æ·»åŠ 
+   ],
+   controllers: [],
+   providers: [],
+ })
+ export class AppModule {} 
```

# MySQLè¿æ¥é”™è¯¯è§£é‡Šä¸è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ

## é”™è¯¯å«ä¹‰

## è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ

#### Windowsç³»ç»Ÿ:

# æ•°æ®åº“åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸï¼Œç»§ç»­åˆ›å»ºè¡¨

## ä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥ï¼šåˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“è¡¨

### æ­¥éª¤1ï¼šåˆ›å»ºç”¨æˆ·è¡¨(users)

```sql
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `username` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ç”¨æˆ·å',
  `password` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT 'å¯†ç ',
  `role` enum('admin', 'employee') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'employee' COMMENT 'è§’è‰²ï¼šadmin-ç®¡ç†å‘˜ï¼Œemployee-å‘˜å·¥',
  `real_name` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'çœŸå®å§“å',
  `email` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'é‚®ç®±',
  `phone` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'æ‰‹æœºå·',
  `avatar` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'å¤´åƒURL',
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´',
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `username` (`username`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='ç”¨æˆ·è¡¨';
```

### æ­¥éª¤2ï¼šåˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®è¡¨(projects)

æ‰§è¡ŒæˆåŠŸåï¼Œç»§ç»­åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®è¡¨ï¼š

# æ•°æ®åº“åˆ›å»ºå®Œæˆï¼Œè¿›å…¥ä¸‹ä¸€é˜¶æ®µï¼šæ¥å£è®¾è®¡ä¸å®ç°

## æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ä¸åç«¯å®ç°æ­¥éª¤

### 1. åˆ›å»ºDTOï¼ˆæ•°æ®ä¼ è¾“å¯¹è±¡ï¼‰

é¦–å…ˆï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªå®ä½“åˆ›å»ºDTOï¼Œç”¨äºå®šä¹‰APIè¯·æ±‚å’Œå“åº”çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ã€‚

åœ¨backendç›®å½•ä¸‹åˆ›å»ºä»¥ä¸‹æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š

```typescript
export class CreateUserDto {
  username: string;
  password: string;
  role?: 'admin' | 'employee';
  realName?: string;
  email?: string;
  phone?: string;
  avatar?: string;
}

// update-user.dto.ts
export class UpdateUserDto {
  username?: string;
  password?: string;
  role?: 'admin' | 'employee';
  realName?: string;
  email?: string;
  phone?: string;
  avatar?: string;
}
```

```typescript
  deliverables: string;
  startDate: Date;
  daysToComplete: number;
  expectedEndDate: Date;
  status?: 'not_started' | 'in_progress' | 'completed' | 'delayed';

  deliverables?: string;

  expectedEndDate?: Date;
```

### 2. åˆ›å»ºæ§åˆ¶å™¨

æ§åˆ¶å™¨è´Ÿè´£å¤„ç†HTTPè¯·æ±‚å’Œå“åº”ï¼š

**ç”¨æˆ·æ§åˆ¶å™¨ (src/modules/users/users.controller.ts)**

```typescript
import { Controller, Get, Post, Body, Param, Put, Delete } from '@nestjs/common';
import { UsersService } from './users.service';
import { CreateUserDto } from './dto/create-user.dto';
import { UpdateUserDto } from './dto/update-user.dto';

@Controller('users')
export class UsersController {
  constructor(private readonly usersService: UsersService) {}

  @Post()
  create(@Body() createUserDto: CreateUserDto) {
    return this.usersService.create(createUserDto);
  }

  @Get()
  findAll() {
    return this.usersService.findAll();
  }

  @Get(':id')
  findOne(@Param('id') id: string) {
    return this.usersService.findOne(+id);
  }

  @Put(':id')
  update(@Param('id') id: string, @Body() updateUserDto: UpdateUserDto) {
    return this.usersService.update(+id, updateUserDto);
  }

  @Delete(':id')
  remove(@Param('id') id: string) {
    return this.usersService.remove(+id);
  }
}
```

**é¡¹ç›®æ§åˆ¶å™¨ (src/modules/projects/projects.controller.ts)**

```typescript
import { Controller, Get, Post, Body, Param, Put, Delete } from '@nestjs/common';
import { ProjectsService } from './projects.service';
import { CreateProjectDto } from './dto/create-project.dto';
import { UpdateProjectDto } from './dto/update-project.dto';

@Controller('projects')
export class ProjectsController {
  constructor(private readonly projectsService: ProjectsService) {}

  @Post()
  create(@Body() createProjectDto: CreateProjectDto) {
    return this.projectsService.create(createProjectDto);
  }

  @Get()
  findAll() {
    return this.projectsService.findAll();
  }

  @Get(':id')
  findOne(@Param('id') id: string) {
    return this.projectsService.findOne(+id);
  }

  @Put(':id')
  update(@Param('id') id: string, @Body() updateProjectDto: UpdateProjectDto) {
    return this.projectsService.update(+id, updateProjectDto);
  }

  @Delete(':id')
  remove(@Param('id') id: string) {
    return this.projectsService.remove(+id);
  }
  
  @Post('verify-password')
  verifyPassword(@Body() body: { id: number; password: string }) {
    return this.projectsService.verifyPassword(body.id, body.password);
  }
}
```

### 3. åˆ›å»ºæœåŠ¡

æœåŠ¡åŒ…å«ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘ï¼š

**ç”¨æˆ·æœåŠ¡ (src/modules/users/users.service.ts)**

```typescript
import { Injectable } from '@nestjs/common';
import { InjectRepository } from '@nestjs/typeorm';
import { Repository } from 'typeorm';
import { User } from '../../database/entities/user.entity';
import { CreateUserDto } from './dto/create-user.dto';
import { UpdateUserDto } from './dto/update-user.dto';

@Injectable()
export class UsersService {
  constructor(
    @InjectRepository(User)
    private usersRepository: Repository<User>,
  ) {}

  async create(createUserDto: CreateUserDto): Promise<User> {
    const user = this.usersRepository.create(createUserDto);
    return this.usersRepository.save(user);
  }

  async findAll(): Promise<User[]> {
    return this.usersRepository.find();
  }

  async findOne(id: number): Promise<User> {
    return this.usersRepository.findOne({ where: { id } });
  }

  async update(id: number, updateUserDto: UpdateUserDto): Promise<User> {
    await this.usersRepository.update(id, updateUserDto);
    return this.findOne(id);
  }

  async remove(id: number): Promise<void> {
    await this.usersRepository.delete(id);
  }
}
```

### 4. åˆ›å»ºæ¨¡å—

æ¨¡å—å°†æ§åˆ¶å™¨å’ŒæœåŠ¡ç»„åˆåœ¨ä¸€èµ·ï¼š

**ç”¨æˆ·æ¨¡å— (src/modules/users/users.module.ts)**

```typescript
import { Module } from '@nestjs/common';
import { TypeOrmModule } from '@nestjs/typeorm';
import { UsersController } from './users.controller';
import { UsersService } from './users.service';
import { User } from '../../database/entities/user.entity';

@Module({
  imports: [TypeOrmModule.forFeature([User])],
  controllers: [UsersController],
  providers: [UsersService],
  exports: [UsersService],
})
export class UsersModule {}
```

### 5. æ›´æ–°ä¸»æ¨¡å—

å°†æ‰€æœ‰åŠŸèƒ½æ¨¡å—å¯¼å…¥åˆ°ä¸»æ¨¡å—ä¸­ï¼š

**ä¸»æ¨¡å— (src/app.module.ts)**

```typescript
import { Module } from '@nestjs/common';
import { ConfigModule, ConfigService } from '@nestjs/config';
import { TypeOrmModule } from '@nestjs/typeorm';
import { User, Project, Node, Issue, Material } from './database/entities';
import { UsersModule } from './modules/users/users.module';
import { ProjectsModule } from './modules/projects/projects.module';
import { NodesModule } from './modules/nodes/nodes.module';
import { IssuesModule } from './modules/issues/issues.module';
import { MaterialsModule } from './modules/materials/materials.module';
import { AuthModule } from './modules/auth/auth.module';

@Module({
  imports: [
    ConfigModule.forRoot({
      isGlobal: true,
    }),
    TypeOrmModule.forRootAsync({
      imports: [ConfigModule],
      inject: [ConfigService],
      useFactory: (configService: ConfigService) => ({
        type: 'mysql',
        host: configService.get('DB_HOST', 'localhost'),
        port: configService.get<number>('DB_PORT', 3306),
        username: configService.get('DB_USERNAME', 'root'),
        password: configService.get('DB_PASSWORD', 'root'),
        database: configService.get('DB_DATABASE', 'liuchengwang'),
        entities: [User, Project, Node, Issue, Material],
        synchronize: configService.get('NODE_ENV') !== 'production',
        logging: configService.get('NODE_ENV') !== 'production',
      }),
    }),
    UsersModule,
    ProjectsModule,
    NodesModule,
    IssuesModule,
    MaterialsModule,
    AuthModule,
  ],
})
export class AppModule {}
```

## å®ç°æ­¥éª¤

1. **æŒ‰ç…§ä¸Šè¿°ç»“æ„åˆ›å»ºæ–‡ä»¶**
2. **ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªå®ä½“ï¼ˆç”¨æˆ·ã€é¡¹ç›®ã€èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€é—®é¢˜ã€ææ–™ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºå®Œæ•´çš„CRUDæ“ä½œ**
3. **å®ç°è®¤è¯æ¨¡å—ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ç™»å½•å’Œæƒé™æ§åˆ¶**
4. **æ·»åŠ æ•°æ®éªŒè¯å’Œé”™è¯¯å¤„ç†**
5. **å®ç°ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘ï¼Œå¦‚é¡¹ç›®å¯†ç éªŒè¯**

## å»ºè®®çš„å®ç°é¡ºåº

## æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦æˆ‘è¯¦ç»†å±•å¼€æŸä¸ªç‰¹å®šæ¨¡å—çš„å®ç°ï¼Ÿ

ç”¨æˆ·å¸Œæœ›æˆ‘è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ›å»ºä»£ç ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯è®©ä»–æ‰‹åŠ¨å¤åˆ¶ç²˜è´´ã€‚æˆ‘éœ€è¦è§£é‡Šä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œä½œä¸ºAIåŠ©æ‰‹ï¼Œæˆ‘æ— æ³•ç›´æ¥åœ¨ä»–çš„ç³»ç»Ÿä¸Šåˆ›å»ºæ–‡ä»¶æˆ–æ‰§è¡Œå‘½ä»¤ï¼Œé™¤éä»–æ˜ç¡®æˆæƒæˆ‘ä½¿ç”¨ç»ˆç«¯å‘½ä»¤å·¥å…·ã€‚

æˆ‘åº”è¯¥è§£é‡Šè¿™ä¸€ç‚¹ï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›ä¸€ç§æ›´ç®€ä¾¿çš„æ–¹å¼æ¥åˆ›å»ºè¿™äº›æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ä½¿ç”¨NestJS CLIçš„å‘½ä»¤ç”Ÿæˆæ¨¡å—ã€æ§åˆ¶å™¨å’ŒæœåŠ¡ï¼Œè¿™æ ·ç”¨æˆ·åªéœ€è¦å¤åˆ¶æ‰§è¡Œå‡ ä¸ªå‘½ä»¤ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯å¤åˆ¶å¤§é‡ä»£ç ã€‚

# ä½¿ç”¨NestJS CLIè‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆä»£ç 

æˆ‘ç†è§£æ‚¨ä¸æƒ³æ‰‹åŠ¨å¤åˆ¶ç²˜è´´å¤§é‡ä»£ç ã€‚ä½œä¸ºæ›¿ä»£æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨NestJS CLIæ¥è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆå¤§éƒ¨åˆ†ä»£ç æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚è¿™æ ·æ‚¨åªéœ€è¦æ‰§è¡Œå‡ ä¸ªå‘½ä»¤ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯å¤åˆ¶å¤§é‡ä»£ç ã€‚

## å‡†å¤‡å·¥ä½œ

ç¡®ä¿æ‚¨å·²å…¨å±€å®‰è£…äº†NestJS CLIï¼š

```bash

```

## ä½¿ç”¨å‘½ä»¤è¡Œç”Ÿæˆä»£ç 

è¯·åœ¨ç»ˆç«¯ä¸­è¿›å…¥backendç›®å½•ï¼Œç„¶åæ‰§è¡Œä»¥ä¸‹å‘½ä»¤ï¼š

### 1. ç”Ÿæˆç”¨æˆ·æ¨¡å—

```bash
cd liuchengwang/backend
nest g module modules/users
nest g controller modules/users
nest g service modules/users
nest g class modules/users/dto/create-user.dto --no-spec
nest g class modules/users/dto/update-user.dto --no-spec
```
